title: BSA Gold Star set to hit Indian roads: Classic legends focuses on premium motorcycles amidst growing competition
description: BSA, the renowned British motorcycle brand, will debut in India on August 15 with its Gold Star model, increasing options for motorcycle enthusiasts and intensifying competition in the middleweight segment. Owned by Classic Legends, which also includes brands like Jawa and Yezdi, BSA's Gold Star has been produced in India for export but will now enter the domestic market.
